summary: This Adds Havok Physics applied 2 Female hairs and 1 Male Hair
descriptionHtml:
[b][youtube]5Yaj1mr-RhI[/youtube]

[b]                                                                                                                   - New Male Hair (Vanilla Hair 01)[/b]

[youtube]eXPJ8z-Sbyc[/youtube]
                                                                                                                   - A Video Clip from  Luchaire.

[youtube]Kzy00663bR4[/youtube]

[size=3]Requirements[/size][/b][size=3] : the latest version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32's XPMS[/url] and SKSE.


[/size][size=3][b]Installation : Install the downloaded archive with Mod Organizer or NMM.

[/b]
This adds 2 Female hair.[/size]

[b][size=5]I strongly recommend you to use [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?][size=5]ECE[/size][/url][size=5] if you are having some clipping issues[/size][/b]


Credits : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/907295/?]azarkiowa[/url] - for providing awesome hair. ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]Ponytail Hairstyles[/url])
              [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]NeuralStunner[/url] - for the awesome hair texture for azar hair
              [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3701232/?]HidrogenSayHDT[/url] - for creating [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]Physics extension plugin[/url].
              [url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOSjY-cKZ7v78F4b5R-ERjg]Canderes[/url] - for his awesome tutorials.
              [url=http://www.loverslab.com/user/46761-yoo/]Yoo[/url] - for his awesome tips.
              [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/183089/?]XP32[/url], [url=http://www.loverslab.com/user/28051-groovtama/]Groovtama[/url] - for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]skeletons[/url]
              [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2274584/?]DragonAge7[/url] - for the hair fix and hair package of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22598/?]oblivion hairs[/url].
[/b]
Changelog :

Version 1.21 - VanillaHair01HDT : Deleted Hairline01's meshes around neck to make the hair look much more clean.
Version 1.20 - Added 1 new male hair (Vanilla Hair 01)
Version 1.15 - Pony Hair : Clipping fix. 
Version 1.14 - Tweaked and fixed some settings. 
Version 1.13 - adjusted 1.12 version's hair movement a little bit so that it moves more lively 
Version 1.12 - Fixed hair from stretching like cheese when you fall from high altitude or move around with high speedmult. 
Version 1.11 - hair movement adjustment 
Version 1.10 - added 1 new female hair 
Version 1.01 - hair adjustment 
Version 1.00 - release[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/managechangelog/?go=delete&id=57538&lid=70072]

[/url]
author: BB
